Title: Heighten vigilance to defend the motherland's coastal defense - don't let the American imperialists occupy an inch of my country
Designer: Preparatory Committee of the East China Branch of the Chinese People's Committee to Preserve World Peace and to Oppose American Aggression (中国人民保卫世界和平反对美国侵略委员会华东总分会筹委会)
Publisher: Shanghai Shengsheng meishu gongsi (上海生生美术公司)
Notes: In front of the massive Chinese coastal fortifications, an American soldier (possibly a caricature of Mac Arthur) hands over a revolver to a Guomindang 'bandit spy' (特匪).
